gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 107, Cavaliers 104
gameRecap.excerpt: Miami holds on to defeat Cleveland 107-104, as Darius Garland missed a 3PT as time expired. Jimmy Butler led the Heat with 30 points, four rebounds, and five assists as Terry Rozier added 24 points and three rebounds while Bam Adebayo missed tonight's game. Jarrett Allen led Cleveland with 25 points (10-13 FG for a 76.9 FG%), along with 20 rebounds while Darius Garland added 20 points and nine assists. The Heat improve to 38-31 as the Cavaliers move to 43-26.
